hero.title: ISAHC
hero.subtitle: A modern, lightweight HTTP library for Node.js
hero.description: Built with TypeScript, featuring both server and client capabilities with Express-like routing and middleware support.

introduction.title: What is ISAHC?
introduction.content: ISAHC is a modern HTTP library for Node.js that provides both server and client functionality. It's designed to be lightweight, fast, and developer-friendly with TypeScript support out of the box.

items.title: TypeScript First
items.description: Built with TypeScript for better developer experience

items.title: Express-like Routing
items.description: Familiar routing patterns and middleware support

items.title: HTTP Client
items.description: Built-in HTTP client with fetch-like API

items.title: Middleware Support
items.description: Extensible middleware system for JSON, static files, and more

items.title: Dual Package
items.description: Supports both CommonJS and ES modules
